page.title: 08GT.YARNMOUTH - Racecourse
page.content: THE GT. YARMOUTH RACECOURSE The Yarmouth Racecourse was originally situated at the South end of the town, growing Industrial site needs forced a move North in 1929. In 1938 our school, North Denes was built next to it, on the other side of thr M.&G.N.Railway line(closed 1959). We suffer from the traffic and noise, particularly the loudspeaker which distracts us. Fortunately the races did not pay, and there are less meetings, instead of the old once a fortnight during the Summer months, so we get told off less often for watching the racing instead of doing our lessons.
